instruction: Design an exercise program for a person who would like to lose weight.
output:
Exercise Program for Weight Loss: 

Monday:
- 15 minutes of interval training
- 20 minutes of circuit training
- 10 minutes of stretching

Tuesday:
- 45 minutes of running or jogging
- 15 minutes of strength training
- 10 minutes of stretching

Wednesday:
- 15 minutes of HIIT
- 30 minutes of swimming
- 10 minutes of stretching

Thursday:
- 30 minutes of weightlifting
- 10 minutes of core exercises
- 10 minutes of stretching 

Friday:
- 20 minutes of jumping rope 
- 20 minutes of cycling
- 10 minutes of stretching

Saturday: 
- 15 minutes of yoga
- 15 minutes of Pilates 
- 10 minutes of stretching

Sunday:
Rest Day
